title: RGD-systems over $\mathbb{F}_2$
abstract:
In this paper we prove that an RGD-system over $\mathbb{F}_2$ with prescribed
commutation relations exists if and only if the commutation relations are
Weyl-invariant and can be realized in the group $U_+$. This result gives us a
machinery to produce new examples of RGD-systems with complicated commutation
relations. We also discuss some applications of this result.
